channel.title: CVE Feed for Halo Service Solutions -- HaloITSM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Halo Service Solutions -- HaloITSM

item.title: CVE-2024-6200|2024-08-06T05:54:53.924Z -- halo%20service%20solutions -- haloitsm
item.description: HaloITSM versions up to 2.146.1 are affected by a Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. The injected JavaScript code can execute arbitrary action on behalf of the user accessing a ticket. HaloITSM versions past 2.146.1 (and patches starting from 2.143.61 ) fix the mentioned vulnerability.
